price: (4) Or do those who do evil deeds think they can outrun [i.e., escape] Us? Evil is what they judge.
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَسۡبِقُونَاۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna yaʿmalūna al-sayiāti an yasbiqūnā sāa mā yaḥkumūna
